meanings.definition: The skill or technique of playing the piano.
meanings.sent1: Her pianism impressed the audience at the recital.
meanings.sent2: His pianism is evident in the way he effortlessly plays complex pieces.
meanings.sent3: The cat's pianism on the keys was surprisingly melodic.
meanings.sent4: Her pianism was like a gentle breeze, soothing and harmonious.
meanings.sent5: The pianism of the young prodigy left a lasting impression on all who listened.

meanings.definition: The style or manner of playing the piano.
meanings.sent1: His unique pianism adds a special touch to his performances.
meanings.sent2: The pianism of the jazz pianist is lively and engaging.
meanings.sent3: The robot's pianism was robotic yet strangely captivating.
meanings.sent4: Her pianism was a colorful tapestry of emotions woven through the keys.
meanings.sent5: The pianism of the old master pianist was like a story unfolding with each note.
